comments_since_last_sample.body: The massholes are never getting enough

Sadly,, Today's majority in leadership of This so called "DEM" party doesn't give two shits about America, and certainly its citizens. Take that TRUTH, from THIS past 25+ year Dem, from the proud Party of JFK,, MLK,, JLL,, ETC... My Party no longer exists!!  The name was hijacked by CAREER, POLITICAL, CRIMINAL, Scum. ( THOSE LIKE HILLARY CLINTON, LIZ WARREN,, OBAMA, BIDEN, PELOSI,,,THE SO CALLED "SQUAD " ,, ETC..)  This is Why I'm a PROUD registered  ( I ),, Who votes Libritarian the majority of the time.  It amazes me the numbers of people,; like myself,, that jumped that Titanic ship!  Whats more amazing,; the numbers of good people,  still within that mess, that KNOW BETTER!!   IT'S PASSED TIME,, TO WAKE FROM THE WOKENESS!!  TRUMP'S Policies,, and any that think like minded,, are needed now more than ever!!
